predictions.text: COMEX Gold (GC) front-month futures will settle at or below $3,500 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME Group official daily settlement for the most-active (front-month) GC futures contract. Any settlement at or below $3,500 on or before 2025-11-30 (UTC) counts.
monitoring_signals: CFTC COT managed-money positioning in gold
COMEX open interest and term structure
Equity risk sentiment (VIX) and real yields
predictions.rationale: After a parabolic spike to $4,000, mean reversion risk is high if real yields or USD firm, or if haven demand cools.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 24.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe official daily close for VIX at or above 24.00 on any U.S. trading day through 2025-11-30 (UTC date).
monitoring_signals: VIX futures term structure (F1–F2 spread) and VVIX
Macro event calendar (CPI, PPI, FOMC, shutdown risk)
predictions.rationale: Rising inflation fears, policy/fiscal uncertainty, and weaker growth signals increase tail-risk hedging demand.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or below 150.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any intraday print at or below 150.00 on JPY=X (Yahoo Finance) within the UTC window counts; corroborate with major FX data providers if disputed.
monitoring_signals: BoJ/MoF policy statements and potential intervention signals
Oil prices (terms of trade for Japan)
predictions.rationale: High intervention risk and softer U.S. data could catalyze a sharp yen rebound toward 150.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI (headline, YoY, NSA) for September 2025 will print between 3.0% and 3.3% in the BLS release on 2025-10-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI press release: 12-month percent change for All Items (CPI-U, NSA). Value must be within [3.0%, 3.3%].
monitoring_signals: Rent measures (ZORI, Apartment List) and OER momentum
Import prices and ocean freight rates (Drewry WCI)
predictions.rationale: Energy/food base effects and easing core goods suggest contained YoY, while shelter keeps it near low-3s.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA MOVE Index (FRED: MOVE) will close at or above 110.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series MOVE (or ICE BofA official) daily close at or above 110.0 on any date through 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and balance sheet operations
Macro growth data (claims, retail sales, ISM)
predictions.rationale: Policy and growth uncertainty plus supply dynamics can reprice rate volatility higher from subdued levels.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will add at least two DPRK-related entries to the SDN List for activity tied to cryptocurrency theft, mixing, exchange, or laundering.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Treasury/OFAC press releases and SDN List updates showing two or more new DPRK-related designations where the narrative cites virtual currency theft/mixing/exchange/laundering.
monitoring_signals: UN Panel of Experts updates on DPRK cyber operations
Treasury press advisories and sanctions calendars
predictions.rationale: Escalating DPRK crypto theft increases likelihood of additional U.S. sanctions actions before year-end.

predictions.text: Microsoft (MSFT) Q1 FY2026 Intelligent Cloud segment revenue will be between $30.0B and $31.5B, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Microsoft’s Q1 FY2026 earnings press release or Form 10-Q segment table. Intelligent Cloud revenue must be within [$30.0B, $31.5B].
monitoring_signals: Azure growth commentary and AI workload demand
Enterprise IT spending surveys and deal pipelines
predictions.rationale: AI workload momentum supports Intelligent Cloud, but macro softness tempers upside.

predictions.text: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q3 FY2026 non-GAAP gross margin will be between 74.0% and 77.0%, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: NVIDIA’s Q3 FY2026 earnings press release. Use the non-GAAP gross margin figure; it must be within [74.0%, 77.0%].
monitoring_signals: TSMC CoWoS capacity/utilization and supply constraints
Cloud provider capex and ordering patterns
predictions.rationale: Tight supply and premium datacenter mix sustain very high margins despite some pricing normalization.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-08 close to 2025-11-30 close, iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF (EEM) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-10-08 to 2025-11-30 for EEM and SPY (Yahoo Finance). EEM – SPY >= +2.0pp satisfies.
predictions.rationale: A softer dollar and improved Asian growth backdrop can lift EM equities relative to U.S. large-cap tech-heavy indices.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude oil front-month futures will settle at or below $80.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE official daily settlement for Brent front-month. Any settlement at or below $80.00 on or before 2025-11-15 (UTC) counts.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly crude/products inventories and implied demand
Global growth indicators and freight rates (Drewry WCI)
predictions.rationale: Freight softness and weak goods demand raise downside risk to crude despite intermittent geopolitical risk premia.
